data.name: Destiny HERO - Departed
data.desc: During your Standby Phase, if this card is in your Graveyard: Special Summon it in face-up Attack Position to your opponent's side of the field. If this card is destroyed by battle, banish it instead of sending it to the Graveyard. If a card effect would send this card to the Graveyard from the hand or Deck, banish it instead.

card_sets.set_name: Legendary Collection 2: The Duel Academy Years Mega Pack
